Package com.northeastern.labyrinth.Model.GameState

Class RefereeState

java.lang.Object
com.northeastern.labyrinth.Model.GameState.AbstractState<PrivatePlayerData>
com.northeastern.labyrinth.Model.GameState.RefereeState
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPlayerState<PrivatePlayerData>, IRefereeState
public final class RefereeState extends AbstractState<PrivatePlayerData> implements IRefereeState
Implementation of methods regarding referee's knowledge of the maze game. The referee state extends the knowledge built in a player state by adding methods on private information.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class com.northeastern.labyrinth.Model.GameState.AbstractState

    • rotateSpare

      public IRefereeState rotateSpare(int degree)
      Description copied from interface: IPlayerState
      Returns a GameState with the spare tile rotated counterclockwise by a degree
      Specified by:
      rotateSpare in interface IPlayerState<PrivatePlayerData>
      Specified by:
      rotateSpare in interface IRefereeState
      Overrides:
      rotateSpare in class AbstractState<PrivatePlayerData>
      Parameters:
      degree - the degree to rotate the spare tile. Degrees must be multiple of 90. Negative values implicitly will rotate clockwise.
      Returns:
      a new copy reflecting the updated player state with rotated spare tile.

    • insertSpare

      public IRefereeState insertSpare(SlideAction action)
      Description copied from interface: IPlayerState
      Returns a GameState with a slided row/col by inserting the spare tile, shifting all players on it. Returned GameState will have given action as its new previousAction If the player is outplaced from the board, reassigns its location to the newly inserted Tile. If the slide undoes the last slide action, throws an error
      Specified by:
      insertSpare in interface IPlayerState<PrivatePlayerData>
      Specified by:
      insertSpare in interface IRefereeState
      Overrides:
      insertSpare in class AbstractState<PrivatePlayerData>
      Parameters:
      action - the slide action to be performed.
      Returns:
      a new copy reflecting the updated player state

    • performMove

      public IRefereeState performMove(Action action)
      Description copied from interface: IRefereeState
      Performs a rotation, slide and movement of the current player. If the player is now on their goal tile AND has performed an action, updates that they have reached their goal tile.
      Specified by:
      performMove in interface IRefereeState
      Parameters:
      action - the action to perform.
      Returns:
      a new copy reflecting the updated referee state.
